titleStmt.title: P.M.S., an elegiac poem in memory of that truly worthy and loyal gentleman William Whitmore, Esquire, late of Balmes in the county of Middlesex, who being wounded by the casual discharge of his own pistol departed this life July the 31th 1684
titleStmt.author: F. N. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
